data.message: FB  How do I get rid of this post?? I am getting a like every couple minutes and there have been thousands of them.  I have blocked Ben Guernsey who I don't even know, but get likes from others I don't know.  I am tired of it.

replies.message: Hi Vee. There's a chance that you'll see stories about the unfriended person through mutual friends. For example, if the unfriended person tags a mutual friend in a photo, you might see this story on your friend's Timeline. -Chantal
